name: The Sound of Sirens
description:
Safely guide your ambulances and rescue all the sickly patients in...

The Sound of Sirens! 

Features:
86 puzzles to prove your mettle!

Hints to lend you a helping hand!

Achievements to stimulate dopamine!

Music by Eric Matyas!

Info:
Mouse required, optional keyboard controls. Mobile not supported :(.

See Settings for full screen (recommended!), sound and data options.
     - Enter the demo password in Settings to carry over your progress!

Read the Manual for details and tips on how to use puzzle mechanics.

Controls:
Interact / Place Arrow / Rotate Arrow - Left Click

Remove Arrow - Right Click or Hold Left Click

Exit Level/Menu - Q

Reset Level - R
